text: The Twelve Months () is a 1956 Soviet animated movie directed by Ivan Ivanov- Vano and Mikhail Botov.Двенадцать месяцевДВЕНАДЦАТЬ МЕСЯЦЕВ (1956) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 movies Category:1950s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano
title: The Twelve Months (1956 movie)
